add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(vdisk-hulldb-base)


target_link_libraries(vdisk-hulldb-base PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  monlib-service-pages
  ydb-core-base
  core-blobstorage-pdisk
  blobstorage-vdisk-protos
)
